QAPair.Question: What is (are) Heart attack - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: A heart attack occurs when blood flow to a part of your heart is blocked long enough that part of the heart muscle is damaged or dies. This article discusses what you need to do to take care of yourself after you leave the hospital.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Heart attack - discharge ?

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Heart attack - discharge ?
